title: Joshua Tree National Park: Park Newspaper
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Newspaper               Park Newspaper      The Joshua Tree Guide is the official park newspaper. It serves as your go-to source for important trip-planning and safety information. In its pages you'll also find a park map; a schedule of ranger programs; information on hiking trails, campgrounds, and backcountry roads; feature articles about what's going on in the park; and much more. The Joshua Tree Guide is published three times a year. The spring and fall issues are 12 pages long. The summer issue is 8 pages long.         Summer Guide: June 1 - September 30, 2016 Download the first edition of the Summer 2016 Joshua Tree Guide (1.8 MB PDF).      Looking for an older edition of the Joshua Tree Guide?
